alert.note: Alert for Benton; Isanti; Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison; Sherburne; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:23PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will continue to cause minor flooding in the following counties... Kanabec...Mille Lacs...Isanti...Benton...Sherburne...Stearns... Morrison... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1221 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in the area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. Some lingering ponding and lowland flooding will continue after the storms have cleared the area. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... St. Cloud, Little Falls, Cambridge, Sauk Rapids, Waite Park, St. Joseph, Isanti, Zimmerman, Princeton, Becker, Cold Spring and Mora.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Isanti; Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison; Sherburne; Stearns
